Element earth; Type utility (Su); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite tremorsense

You can spend 10 minutes to extend your tremorsense outward while in a natural underground setting, letting you learn three facts as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.icjrw9y6pa1uatlz]{Commune with Nature}, except your tremorsense canâ€™t tell if a creature is a woodland creature or a powerful unnatural creature.
